text: Maly my ukhvalyly dlya nykh: "Vy povynni zaproponuvaty vashi zhyttya," abo povynni "Vidmovytysya vid vashykh domivok," vony by ne zrobyly tse, krim dlya nechyslennoho z nykh. (Navitʹ yakshcho b taka komanda bula vydana,) mala vony zrobyly shcho vony buly nakazani shchob zrobyty, tse bulo b krashche dlya nykh, ta by dokazalo sylu yikhnʹoyi viry
